tool_description: Analyzes historical air quality trends to identify patterns, seasonal variations, and long-term changes in indoor air metrics.

historical_data.description: Array of historical metric values for trend analysis

timestamps.description: Array of ISO 8601 timestamps corresponding to historical data

analysis_period.description: Time period for analysis: week, month, quarter, year

confidence_level.description: Statistical confidence level for trend detection (0.8-0.99)

error_messages: Data length mismatch: historical_data and timestamps must have equal length.
Insufficient data: Need at least 10 data points for trend analysis.
Invalid analysis period: Use week, month, quarter, or year.
Invalid trend method: Use linear, polynomial, or moving_average.
Invalid confidence level: Must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 format.
Data too sparse: Time gaps too large for reliable trend analysis.
usage: Provide historical_data with timestamps, specify analysis_period and optionally configure trend_method, detect_seasonality, and confidence_level for detailed analysis.

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: increasing, decreasing, stable

prediction_next_week.description: Predicted average value for next week

confidence_interval.description: Lower and upper bounds of prediction confidence interval
